facebook.title: Æthelflæd: the Anglo-Saxon iron lady
facebook.summary: We don't usually associate Anglo-Saxon England with powerful women. But Æthelflæd was one most powerful political figures in 10th-century Britain.

news.title: Æthelflæd: the Anglo-Saxon iron lady
news.summary: The UK now has a female prime minister and Elizabeth II has been queen for more than six decades, but few would associate Anglo-Saxon England with powerful women.
